PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-14532012-11-01,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Corrections and Conditional Release Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CORRECTIONS AND CONDITIONAL RELEASE REGULATIONS in order to (1) achieve necessary efficiencies without undue risk to the public or adversely affecting the rights of offenders; and (2) remove section 159 and subsection 165(a) that refer to accelerated parole review provisions in the Act that were repealed in 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0234 Publication Date: 2012-11-21
AttachmentsAttachment
